mapper.insert: insert into gamescore (gamescoreno, wordbookno, gameselectno, userno, gamescore) values (gamescore_seq.nextval, ${wordbookNo}, (select gameselectno from gameselect where gameselectname = '${gameName}'), (select userno from users where id = '${master}'), ${gameScore})
mapper.select: select wordbookno from wordbook w,directory d,users u where u.id='${master}' and u.userno = d.userno and d.directoryno = w.directoryno and rownum =1 order by wordbookno asc
